name: Block Puzzle Jigsaw Master
description:
Block Puzzle Jigsaw Master is a totally free, simple and fun puzzle game. It improves brain acuteness and memory. simple and funny, suitable for all ages players.

You can enjoy it anytime and anywhere. You just drag the box onto the board, Awarded for completion of all levels achieving the minimum set scores, and you can upgrade or get the Gold Award. The golden coins awarded by the classic mode can be used to purchase props in the challenge mode. Block Puzzle Jigsaw Master includes two modes, classic mode and challenge mode.

[classic mode]
The rules of are simple, drag the boxes onto the board to remove a whole row or a whole column on the grid vertically or horizontally. The more squares you remove, the higher the gold prize you get. Remember, if there is no excess space in the grid, then the game is over.

[challenge model]
The game consists of 300 levels. Each level has a corresponding goal or task. You will get twice the result with half the effort if you drag the block to the right place.The higher level comes with higher difficulty

[how to play]

Classic model
• drag the square into the stuffing board

• try to put them in a row or column

•The more squares you smash, the more golds you will get.

•If the grid is unable to put down the new block, the game will end.

• blocks cannot be rotated

Challenge model
•Drag the box onto the fill plate to remove the specified block.

• completion of the mission goals

• various props are available: bombs, cross elimination, refresh and rotation.

• sign in every day and receive generous rewards

We really hope you like it. Let's play a game.
